skills.title: Data Analysis

portfolio.title: SugarAIde
portfolio.description: A simple application to help people at risk of diabetes by harnessing the power of AI and open source datasets to keep track of your diet and eating habits.

portfolio.title: Role Playing Game
portfolio.description: A simple role playing game made with HTML, CSS, and Javascript. Based on the FreeCodeCamp tutorial with additional features I implemented.

portfolio.title: JobTrackr
portfolio.description: JobTrackr is a web app that simplifies job searching by tracking offers, interviews, and enabling resume and cover letter uploads for each application. This app was made for HackTheBreak 2023.

portfolio.title: SnowGlobe
portfolio.description: We are developing SnowGlobe, a web app to help drivers and commuters to alert others of weather hazards on the road by using real-time and user data.
